description: Sickama: Greeting warrior! Welcome to our land.
Player: Oh, a Dodge Dragon spirit. I am a knight; I spent my time exploring the world.
Player: This valley looks very beautiful, but I can feel the pain and sorrow from the trees, forest, and in the wind. Can you give me some hints about your countryside, little Dragon?

Sickama: I am the guardian of this forest and land. We used to have a very beautiful valley. However, a massive and bloody army of darkness had invaded us. They occupied the underground maze and terrorized every innocent person and animal on the ground.
Sickama: We could not resist, so every person and animal had to flee for their lives.
Player: Of course. Helping people is the purpose of the journey. I had defeated many bad gangs and pirates in my adventure.
Player: Can you tell me something about the darkness armies?
Sickama: They are very powerful monsters. They occupied every room and treasure in the maze.
Sickama: You have to defeat monsters to get the better defense and items in each room.
Sickama: every floor has a massive and extremely powerful boss. You have to be careful.
Sickama: Hundred warriors and knights had come, fought, and tried to purge the maze.
Sickama: But only one of them can come back badly injured. On the last breath, he reveals that the monster bosses are in semi-God form. All of their weapons and magic could not hurt them.
Sickama: He saw a bright and magnificent fountain in the maze. The last knight advises me to bring the new coming knight and warriors to this room. It could be useful.
Sickama: After that he passed away.
Player: I feel very interested in this adventure now. Now Let's explore the underground maze.
Sickama: Warrior! I give you this sword. We can enter their dungeon now. Follow me!
